sentences.english: A road trip into the country can be a leisurely drive that lets you enjoy the scenic view.
sentences.chinese: 去郊外的自駕遊就從容到能讓你飽覽沿途風光了。

sentences.english: Does he know where I can take a bus to the suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 他知道在哪裏我可以坐公交車到郊外去嗎？

sentences.english: Are you swanning off to the suburb this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你打算今天下午去郊外轉轉嗎？

sentences.english: I have got a simple flat in the faubourg.
sentences.chinese: 我在郊外有一套簡單的公寓。

sentences.english: He was buried on a hillside outside Nanjing, not far from Sun Yat-sen’s mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 他被埋葬在南京郊外的一個小山丘邊，離中山陵不遠。

sentences.english: Leisure , them gather a, go to outskirt to step spring.
sentences.chinese: 閒暇時，它們聚集一起，到郊外踏春。

sentences.english: The museum was located in the suburbs of Kiev in 1976.
sentences.chinese: 博物館建造於1976年，坐落在首都基輔的郊外。

sentences.english: Other photos show Pitt, Jolie and 3-year-old Maddox at Luton Airport outside London.
sentences.chinese: 其他的照片則是攝於倫敦郊外的盧頓機場。

sentences.english: A boy climbs onto the train in a Guangzhou suburb.
sentences.chinese: 廣州郊外，一個扒車的少年。

sentences.english: Want, go countryside or mountain go, hear in the South.
sentences.chinese: 在南方長短要上郊外或山上去才聽獲得的。

sentences.english: In the south is not to the countryside or mountain go hear.
sentences.chinese: 在南方是非要上郊外或山上去才聽得到的。

sentences.english: LJ washes his hands inside the cabin.
sentences.chinese: LJ在那座郊外的小屋裏洗手。

sentences.english: Dachas and weekend cottages will be popular.
sentences.chinese: 郊外別墅和週末小別墅將會風靡。

sentences.english: I met her in a small, untidy coffeehouse on the outskirts of London.
sentences.chinese: 我是在倫敦郊外的一個狹小凌亂的咖啡館遇見她的。

sentences.english: He will be buried in the suburb of Los Angeles at Glendale Forest-Lawn memorial park.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜將被葬在洛杉磯郊外“森林草坪”公墓。

sentences.english: In the suburb of Liang, they meet each other by chance.
sentences.chinese: 師徒倆在梁地的郊外碰巧遇上了。

definition: to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
